replies.body:
Do the players have to be apart of OPL in order for them to receive votes?
I would love to vote for Paws. #rip
Yeah mate they have to be a part of the OPL as a starting roster!

ADC: Raydere
Support: flyingjoo (cuz his suspension only stated "with his team" so all stars should be acceptable because the way his suspension was written, he has a strong case).
Mid: Rymeister
Top: Swip3r
Jungle: Juves (because he raised a shitload of money for charity)
Weird they have an All-star team when Raydere is the only decent player on the server.
